channel.title: New Cookie Thread. First to 1000 posts get cookie
channel.description:
Since the cookie thread won’t show any more due to it having too many posts, I have decided to make a new one.
Note , for whoever the hell reported this as spam
![image|281x500](upload://rBuASXBlK5bZHZMbL5hutHjM8AP.jpeg) ![image|281x500](upload://2KfR9Iy0hWgX9oYhQ2Cf0w9elFW.jpeg)
the old cookie thread clearly shows that it does **not show up in the thread recommended anymore. This is why I made this new thread so it does show up. The cookie thread has too many posts for it to show up.** and even still flagging it as spam is incorrect. It is not advertisement. ![image|281x500](upload://nF7jxYyIVFEXsIinpdeMBrwGKyi.jpeg)
